Malice:
 
"Yes, but we can't go looking for him, the others will get suspisious.  Let's let him be for now," he says, sipping from his glass.

airly2000 <airly2002@...> wrote:
BlackNightmare:

"Do you think that isn't weird that we haven't seen Injustice since 
the battle?" said suddenly the femme


--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, robert riley <bustercross365@y...> 
wrote:
> Malice:
>  
> He kept silent, Blacknightmare seemed to want to think.
> 
> airly2000 <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> BlackNightmare:
> 
> The femme drink slowly her anergon, toughtfully and in silence.
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, robert riley <bustercross365@y...> 
> wrote:
> > Malice: 
> >  
> > The male took his glasses and took a long drink before setting 
it 
> down.  He could feel the stuff course through his body.  It made 
him 
> feel good.  Real good.
> > 
> > airly2000 <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> > BlackNightmare:
> > 
> > The femme sat down and just said "Same for me"
> > 
> > A drone flew towards them and served the energon
> !
